actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that increases thereunder (whether occurring by reason of increases in the cost of living or enacted by law) shall not be considered as annual income for purposes of certain other benefit programs.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides that increases in monthly insurance benefits under title II of the Social Security Act (Old-Age, Survivors' and Disability Insurance) whether occurring by reason of increases in the cost of living or enacted by law, shall not be considered as annual income for purposes of other benefit programs under title VI of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that increases thereunder (whether occurring by reason of increases in the cost of living or enacted by law) shall not be considered as annual income for purposes of certain other benefit programs.
